title: Need Help fixing my client/computer
body: So basically, I haven't been able to play the game for about 6/7 months now due to the game automatically minimising as soon as it starts. When I go to click on the minimised tab it doesn't bring the game back up at all, it just flickers. Now while not playing has been pretty beneficial to my academic year, I'm pretty bored these holidays and want to try get back into it. I've tried getting a few mates to fix it, but seem to be overlooking the problem. Anyone have any idea what could be the issue? I have Norton internet security, which has been suggested to be the cause, but I didn't have any problems before, and all the League affiliated programs are allowed through firewall and the like.
